title: The Dark Side of Death
description: Author S. T. Phillips kicks off the Dark Side series with the explosive new thriller, The Dark Side of Death. When Washington D.C. police officer Jack Dublin shoots and kills a powerful U.S. Senator's only son in self-defense, he becomes a marked man. Forced to retire, Jack soon finds himself as the fall guy for a murder tied to Pakistani terrorists buying weapons of mass destruction. Warned that a major catastrophic event is imminent, the FBI and the CIA suspect Jack and are hot on his trail. When Jack enlists the help of a beautiful woman to help him, the stakes become even higher. With death lurking around every corner, Jack must run for cover but not before finding the man who set him up. The Dark Side of Death takes Jack from Washington, D.C. to exotic parts of the Caribbean to confront and stop the terrorists while searching for the man he has to deliver to justice.
author: S.T. Phillips
